channel.title: Npc auto-attack
channel.description: is there a way to make npc's auto attack i made a king black dragon boss area but he doesnt auto attack and when u attack him he doesnt attack back what a wimp lol any1 know where i can edit that at?

item.title: Npc auto-attack
item.dc:creator: @Rufio Rufio
item.description:
@Rufio wrote:

ok thanks ill tell u how it goes[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 24, 2008, 04:07:25 pm[/size][hr]it didnt work
he still wont attack

Read full topic

item.title: Npc auto-attack
item.dc:creator: @armadyl_slayer armadyl slayer
item.description:
@armadyl_slayer wrote:

you dont necasarily have to do that

just change all isunderattack = false; to

isunderattack = true;

Read full topic

item.title: Npc auto-attack
item.dc:creator: @Rufio Rufio
item.description:
@Rufio wrote:

ok uhm i did that and he didnt auto attack i post that area of my npchandler if some1 can edit the kbd code into it?
like when i did what u said reaper, i killed him and he didnt auto attack infact he wont even attack back at all he just walks around still and its very annoying.
then after i killed him a few times he transformed in a hell hound but i fixed that
he’s that area of my npc handler

[code] for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) {
client person = (client) p;

                    if (p != null && person != null) {
                        if (p != null && person != null) { 
                            if (person.distanceToPoint(npcs[i].absX,
                                    npcs[i].absY)
                                    >= 5) {
                                if (npcs[i].npcType != 1158
                                        || npcs[i].npcType == 2745) {
                                    npcs[i].RandomWalk = true;
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
                for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) {
                    client person = (client) p;

                    if (p != null && person != null) {
                        if (p != null && person != null) { 
                            if (person.distanceToPoint(npcs[i].absX,
                                    npcs[i].absY)
                                    <= 20
                                            && p.heightLevel
                                                    == npcs[i].heightLevel) {
                                if (npcs[i].npcType == 1158
                                        || npcs[i].npcType == 2745) {
                                    npcs[i].StartKilling = person.playerId;
                                    npcs[i].RandomWalk = false;
                                    npcs[i].IsUnderAttack = true;
                                } else if (person.distanceToPoint(
                                        npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY)
                                                >= 21
                                                        || person.heightLevel
                                                                != npcs[i].heightLevel) {
                                    if (npcs[i].npcType == 1158
                                            || npcs[i].npcType == 2745) {
                                        npcs[i].RandomWalk = true;
                                    }
                                }
                            } 
                        }
                    }
                }[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Npc auto-attack
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“The Reaper X, post:2, topic:232872”]go into npc handler.

search for 2745 (jad) or 1158 (kqueen). look around the code that they’re placed in. it should look like this:

[code] for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) {
client person = (client) p;

what he said ^^ 

                    if (p != null && person != null) {
                        if (p != null && person != null) { 
                            if (person.distanceToPoint(npcs[i].absX,
                                    npcs[i].absY)
                                    >= 5) {
                                if (npcs[i].npcType != 1158
                                        || npcs[i].npcType == 2745) {
                                    npcs[i].RandomWalk = true;
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
                for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) {
                    client person = (client) p;

                    if (p != null && person != null) {
                        if (p != null && person != null) { 
                            if (person.distanceToPoint(npcs[i].absX,
                                    npcs[i].absY)
                                    <= 20
                                            && p.heightLevel
                                                    == npcs[i].heightLevel) {
                                if (npcs[i].npcType == 1158
                                        || npcs[i].npcType == 2745) {
                                    npcs[i].StartKilling = person.playerId;
                                    npcs[i].RandomWalk = false;
                                    npcs[i].IsUnderAttack = true;
                                } else if (person.distanceToPoint(
                                        npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY)
                                                >= 21
                                                        || person.heightLevel
                                                                != npcs[i].heightLevel) {
                                    if (npcs[i].npcType == 1158
                                            || npcs[i].npcType == 2745) {
                                        npcs[i].RandomWalk = true;
                                    }
                                }
                            } 
                        }
                    }
                }[/code]

add your npc ID after the others. so add || npcs[i]npcType == #### after the others as necessary.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Npc auto-attack
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

go into npc handler.

search for 2745 (jad) or 1158 (kqueen). look around the code that they’re placed in. it should look like this:

[code] for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) {
client person = (client) p;

                    if (p != null && person != null) {
                        if (p != null && person != null) { 
                            if (person.distanceToPoint(npcs[i].absX,
                                    npcs[i].absY)
                                    >= 5) {
                                if (npcs[i].npcType != 1158
                                        || npcs[i].npcType == 2745) {
                                    npcs[i].RandomWalk = true;
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
                for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) {
                    client person = (client) p;

                    if (p != null && person != null) {
                        if (p != null && person != null) { 
                            if (person.distanceToPoint(npcs[i].absX,
                                    npcs[i].absY)
                                    <= 20
                                            && p.heightLevel
                                                    == npcs[i].heightLevel) {
                                if (npcs[i].npcType == 1158
                                        || npcs[i].npcType == 2745) {
                                    npcs[i].StartKilling = person.playerId;
                                    npcs[i].RandomWalk = false;
                                    npcs[i].IsUnderAttack = true;
                                } else if (person.distanceToPoint(
                                        npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY)
                                                >= 21
                                                        || person.heightLevel
                                                                != npcs[i].heightLevel) {
                                    if (npcs[i].npcType == 1158
                                            || npcs[i].npcType == 2745) {
                                        npcs[i].RandomWalk = true;
                                    }
                                }
                            } 
                        }
                    }
                }[/code]

add your npc ID after the others. so add || npcs[i]npcType == #### after the others as necessary.

Read full topic
